attributes.action: lift any suspension or penalty on Jonathan Ross & Russell Brand and make it clear that they hold the full support of the BBC license payers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC received 1800 complaints about phone messages made by Russell Brand and Jonathan Ross on their Radio 2 show. By signing this petition you join the ranks of the license payers who wish to convey to the two through Gordon Brown that they have a weighty number of supporters who think it was a jolly good giggle.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
